name: Game Jam Simulator 2023
description:
Will AI replace the root people of gamedev: designers, coders and artists? What are the roots of a good game - can a machine alone create it? Play a narrative game created by people and AI, about making games with AI!

AI used: Chat GPT, DALL-E2, Midjourney, SoundRaw, MeloBytes, TTSmp3
